title: Missing link to Codewalks from the Documentation page
body:
There is currently no link into the http://golang.org/codewalk/ page from the
http://golang.org/doc/docs.html page. 

Actually, the only link to the codewalks was a blog post some time a go. There is no
other way of finding them. Such a reach tutorial system deserves a more obvious link in
the project's Documentation landing page.
